name: Open Tarteel
description: Open-source Quran audio streaming PWA with bilingual support (Arabic/English)

conventions.stateRule: Use createAtomWithStorage for persisted state, useState for transient only
conventions.styling: Tailwind CSS only, cn() helper for conditional classes
conventions.naming: No abbreviations (unicorn), kebab-case files, PascalCase components
conventions.i18n: All UI strings via react-intl, update both ar.json and en.json

domainConcepts.moshaf: مصحف — A specific recording set by a reciter
domainConcepts.riwaya: رواية — Recitation style/transmission chain (Hafs, Warsh, etc.)
domainConcepts.surah: سورة — A chapter of the Quran (114 total)
domainConcepts.playlist: Array of {surahId, link} for audio playback
